QuestData.Title: Wake of Destruction
QuestData.Description: Our time here draws to a close. I must somehow follow the trail of these naga captives if we are to discover their purposes in this region.$b$bBut before I move on, I would see the destruction of this operation!$b$bNevermind their numbers, I have a plan that has the potential to even the odds.$b$bOutside this cave, famished great sharks, displaced by these naga, seek food.$b$bIn their weakened state, they will be susceptible to suggestion. Use this orb to subdue them, then direct them against our enemy.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Orb of Suggestion to subdue a Famished Great Shark, then use it to destroy 12 Zin'jatar at The Clutch.
QuestData.CompletionText: With the naga numbers dramatically lessened, we shall be able to finish our destruction of this stronghold.
QuestData.RewardText: It is as it should be.$b$bNow the way is clear to deal these naga a crippling blow.
